participant_1.background:
I'm the son of lawyers and I can make fart noises with my armpits.
i also enjoy reading the game of thrones series books.
my mother was an rn.
I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need.
I went camping with my family at a lake and we all had a great time swimming, hiking and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.

participant_2.background:
I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast.
i enjoy writing for long periods of time.
i am an excellent student.
I am not a morning person, but my pets always wake me up with a smile.
I remember reading books in the car with my dad when we were going on long road trips.

content.text: Hi there!  How are you today?
Hi! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks!  I recently went camping with my family and we had a lot of fun.  We did a lot of swimming, hiking, and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.  It was a great time.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I've never been camping, but it sounds like something I would enjoy.
You should definitely give it a try!  It's a great way to get outside and enjoy nature.
I will!  Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!  So, what do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy writing, reading, and spending time with my pets.
I love reading too!  What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and mystery novels.
I love historical fiction too!  What's your favorite historical fiction book?
That's a tough question!  I have a lot of favorite historical fiction books, but I think I would have to say my favorite is Pillars of the Earth by Ken Follett.
I've heard great things about that book!  I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should!  It's a great read.
So, what kind of pets do you have?
I have a dog and a cat.
I love dogs!  What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever.
Golden retrievers are so cute!  I love their sweet personalities.
They are!  They're the best dogs.
I'm glad to hear you're enjoying your pets.
Thanks!  They're great companions.
It sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies.
Thanks!  I try to keep myself busy.
That's good!  I think it's important to have hobbies that you enjoy.
I agree!  It makes life more fun.
I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying your life.
Thanks!  I am
